definition: Deng Xiaoping's four modernizations practiced from the 1980s (possibly planned together with Zhou Enlai), namely: modernization of industry, agriculture, national defense and science and technology/abbr. to 四化
four/4
variant of 個|个[ge4]
individual/this/that/size/classifier for people or objects in general
to appear/present/now/existing/current
to substitute/to act on behalf of others/to replace/generation/dynasty/age/period/(historical) era/(geological) eon
to make into/to change into/-ization/to ... -ize/to transform/abbr. for 化學|化学[hua4 xue2]
variant of 花[hua1]
modernization of science and technology, one of Deng Xiaoping's Four Modernizations
